languages.text: "Не умею? Да я танцевал". {n}Соломон говорит это таким голосом, каким иные признаются в страшной ереси.{/n} "Боюсь представить, что для вас значит веселье, если нашего танца на Тассере вам оказалось мало".
"No good? I danced!" {n}Solomorne says as if confessing to an act of heresy.{/n} "I shudder to think what counts as leisure to you if our dance on Thassera wasn't enough."
languages.original_text: "Не умею? Да я танцевал". {n}Соломон говорит это таким голосом, каким иные признаются в страшной ереси.{/n} "Боюсь представить, что для вас значит веселье, если нашего танца на Тассере вам оказалось мало".

"No good? I danced!" {n}Solomorne says as if confessing to an act of heresy.{/n} "I shudder to think what counts as leisure to you if our dance on Thassera wasn't enough."

languages.text: 「下手？踊ったのに！」{n}まるで異端行為を告白するかのような口調で、ソロモーンは言った。{/n}「タッセーラでのあのダンスで足りないというなら…あなたにとっての『娯楽』とは、一体何なんですか？」
languages.original_text: "No good? I danced!" {n}Solomorne says as if confessing to an act of heresy.{/n} "I shudder to think what counts as leisure to you if our dance on Thassera wasn't enough."

traits.locale_text: 「下手？踊ったのに！」{n}まるで異端行為を告白するかのような口調で、ソロモーンは言った。{/n}「タッセーラでのあのダンスで足りないというなら…あなたにとっての『娯楽』とは、一体何なんですか？」

languages.text: "Nicht gut? Ich habe getanzt!" {n}Bei Solomorne klingt das, als habe er einen Akt der Ketzerei gebeichtet.{/n} "Mich schaudert bei dem Gedanken, was als Unterhaltung zählt, wenn unser Tanz auf Thassera dafür nicht ausreicht."
languages.original_text: "No good? I danced!" {n}Solomorne says as if confessing to an act of heresy.{/n} "I shudder to think what counts as leisure to you if our dance on Thassera wasn't enough."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht gut? Ich habe getanzt!" {n}Bei Solomorne klingt das, als habe er einen Akt der Ketzerei gebeichtet.{/n} "Mich schaudert bei dem Gedanken, was als Unterhaltung zählt, wenn unser Tanz auf Thassera dafür nicht ausreicht."

languages.text: « Comment ça ? J'ai dansé ! {n}s'exclame Solomorne d'un air aussi gêné que s'il confessait un acte d'hérésie.{/n} Je frémis d'imaginer ce que vous considérez comme un divertissement digne de ce nom, si ce qui vous a été proposé sur Thassera ne vous a pas suffi. »
languages.original_text: "No good? I danced!" {n}Solomorne says as if confessing to an act of heresy.{/n} "I shudder to think what counts as leisure to you if our dance on Thassera wasn't enough."

traits.locale_text: « Comment ça ? J'ai dansé ! {n}s'exclame Solomorne d'un air aussi gêné que s'il confessait un acte d'hérésie.{/n} Je frémis d'imaginer ce que vous considérez comme un divertissement digne de ce nom, si ce qui vous a été proposé sur Thassera ne vous a pas suffi. »

languages.text: «¿Cómo que no? ¡Si bailé y todo!»{n}, replica Solomorne como si confesara un acto de herejía.{/n} «Miedo me da pensar qué considera usted diversión si nuestro baile en Thassera no le pareció suficiente».
languages.original_text: "No good? I danced!" {n}Solomorne says as if confessing to an act of heresy.{/n} "I shudder to think what counts as leisure to you if our dance on Thassera wasn't enough."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo que no? ¡Si bailé y todo!»{n}, replica Solomorne como si confesara un acto de herejía.{/n} «Miedo me da pensar qué considera usted diversión si nuestro baile en Thassera no le pareció suficiente».

languages.text: “我明明跳过舞了！那还不算吗？”{n}索罗蒙开了口，仿佛在承认自己的异端恶行一样。{/n}“如果连一起跳舞都算不上娱乐，那对你而言什么才算呢？我真是不敢想象。”
languages.original_text: "No good? I danced!" {n}Solomorne says as if confessing to an act of heresy.{/n} "I shudder to think what counts as leisure to you if our dance on Thassera wasn't enough."

traits.locale_text: “我明明跳过舞了！那还不算吗？”{n}索罗蒙开了口，仿佛在承认自己的异端恶行一样。{/n}“如果连一起跳舞都算不上娱乐，那对你而言什么才算呢？我真是不敢想象。”

languages.text: "Anlamıyor muyum? Ben dans ettim!" {n}Solomorne, sanki işlediği bir kâfirliği itiraf ediyormuş gibi konuşuyor.{/n} "Thassera'daki dansımız yeterli değilse boş zamanlarınızda neler yaptığınızı düşününce tüylerim diken diken oluyor."
languages.original_text: "No good? I danced!" {n}Solomorne says as if confessing to an act of heresy.{/n} "I shudder to think what counts as leisure to you if our dance on Thassera wasn't enough."

traits.locale_text: "Anlamıyor muyum? Ben dans ettim!" {n}Solomorne sanki işlediği bir kâfirliği itiraf ediyormuş gibi konuşuyor.{/n} "Thassera'daki dansımız yeterli değilse sizin boş zamanlarınızda neler yaptığınızı düşününce tüylerim diken diken oluyor."

languages.original_text: "No good? I danced!" {n}Solomorne says as if confessing to an act of heresy.{/n} "I shudder to think what counts as leisure to you if our dance on Thassera wasn't enough."
